Installing MLWorks

3 Suggested minimum system configurations for MLWorks

To run the Windows 95 version of MLWorks 1.1 we recommend at least 20 MB RAM. For running on Windows NT, we recommend at least 24 MB RAM.

The distribution folder for Windows 95 and Windows NT is 9 MB; the installed system takes up around 23 MB. Therefore, during installation you will need around 32 MB of free disk space.

See Section 10 on page 16 for details of how to tune settings in MLWorks and Windows to improve performance.

MLWorks 2.0 Installation Notes - 12 Aug 1998
